content: Hi, Discord won't allow me to set up 2FA.  I tried downloading Google Authenticator and scanned the QR Code, but the 6-digit codes won't work.  I also purchased a Google Titan Security Key, which the Discord 2FA doesn't recognize.  I'd appreciate any help I can get, since I can't perform any moderation functions without it!

Hi <@1262361764796825722> can you come to the Discord training at 7p eastern today?
https://mobilize.us/s/lvz2ve/r
I can help you then, otherwise I can meet you on zoom tomorrow and sort this out.

Thanks Carolyn.  I had signed up for Discord Dashboard training, but I was in another training for Combating Mis and Dis Information.  I'm going to be a training Facilitator for 12-2 today (ET).  I would love to chat with you by Zoom.  I work from 3-7, and then offered to do confirm the PB'ers from 7:30-8:30.  Are you free now?  (I know it's a big ask)!!
Hi <@1262361764796825722> I'm available from now until 8pm eastern (and after 9p) today. Sorry I missed you earlier, I'm west coast and I do my volunteer work in my afternoon/evenings.
